content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel, and a steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) that is empty and another pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with full output

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668) not plugged into the electric network

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) that is empty

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and another transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) both working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
- Make sure to provide source items for burner inserters

### Errors when using steam engines
- Connect the steam engine to a power source to make it work

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Plug the electricity group into the electric network to make it work

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group is not empty before using it
- Make sure that the pipe group has a full output before using it

### Errors when using transport belts
- Ensure that the transport belt is not empty before using it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
